Dustin Poirier Loses Retirement Fight as Max Holloway Retains BMF Title at UFC 318 - Bleacher Report
articles.summary: Dustin Poirier Loses Retirement Fight as Max Holloway Retains BMF Title at UFC 318 Max Holloway took advantage of his last chance to beat Dustin Poirier with a unanimous decision win over The Diamond at UFC 318 in his opponent's retirement fight in New Orleans on Saturday night. Holloway drew first blood. Blessed cracked Poirier with a quick one-two combination...
